Reviews.Title: Great system
Reviews.Author: Nancy "nancy28"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on the advice of one of the Amazon reps since it had everything I was looking for (and I was very specific on what I wanted.)  It runs great.  The only issue I had trouble with was the face recognition for login; the light always seemed too low for it to work properly and it would just churn forever.  I disabled that (uninstalled it) and it's been running fine ever since.  Plenty of speed and power for what I use it for -- Internet browsing, light games, word processing, spreadsheets.  Movies play great, display is great.
